body: First reimu and cirno 1 2 3 and then this got canned. Damn
So sad this series got axed, been following this since 2012
Ep 11 and 12 never come back

Kishirimost likely left/disbanded Nounai Kanojo(not the eroge dev) since this was his last work under that name alongside "Kyoko and her beloved Idiot" in 2013, and Wolt's first published work was in 2014, and might've changed to another pseudonym when he/she went to(or made) Studio Wolt so it's alias won't associate with the old circle. With that being said this series might never see the day of its ending, even if this is Kishiri's original fan work, it's still technically under Nounai Kanojo and probably doesn't want to be re-associated with it.

After re-reading "Kaminari no Chihare", there is an afterword by him that he did have some thoughts continuing this series, but is worried since it'll be under a name and a new circle as it's already a fanwork of a doujin series. It'll be somewhat become a *third generation* work, a derivative work of a derivative work(doujin of a doujin of a doujin).

Fucking hell it's already been 8 years since this manga came out

The new war is coming?

But also just thinking about it after rereading, I remembered that the Great Hakurei Barrier, while is maintained by the Hakurei Shrine maiden who resides in the Hakurei Shrine, it is not connected the physical shrine itself, just as the border isn’t a physical border. In the events of Touhou 10.5, despite the Hakurei Shrine being destroyed, the Great Hakurei Barrier still stayed up and we didn’t have the Fantasy Land of Gensokyo appear in the outside world

Well it sucks we’re not getting an ending, I started reading one random doujin and found an entire series, one of the best I’ve ever read on this site. Kept me so hooked I forgot I was here to fap sometimes. Even though uncompleted, I shall record this gem in my list of sauce
The chances of getting a closure or final chapter is probably 0 😔
Oh, well damn. This actually had some story-telling, unlike other doujins. I liked this actually.

I deleted the e-mail some time ago (I asked him approximately in February), I asked him on his personal e-mail but he was like "it's not the place to ask me, stop asking me" (my bad because yes it's not the right place). i don't know if it's only because i asked him on his e-mail or because he doesn't want to be asked because it happens often like the tweet you posted
@teddy7 can i know what's their response? From what i know the last is still in progress, but somehow they never finished it, https://twitter.com/miyaoryuu/status/978841255022034944?s=20

Yes i can confirm, after research he never continued his touhou doujin but he is still alive and active on Twitter (https://twitter.com/miyaoryuu) and he still has his Pixiv account (https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=618585). But I recommend you to don't ask him why he stopped, I already asked him and I think he didn't take it very well and he didn't really answer me.

I'm sorry, but I've searched Japanese pages and researched mostly about this author, good as possible, but this is the last chapter and no other ... and I do not think that another one comes out, I'm sorry but it's the raw truth.
So many years....i am still waiting for just an ending for this series.....
